text: RSGB can refer to the following: ==Organizations== * Radio Society of Great Britain, a radio operators organization established in 1913 * Reform Synagogues of Great Britain, former name for Movement for Reform Judaism (UK). * Russian Soviet Government Bureau, informal diplomatic organization in the USA from 1919 to 1921 ==Videogames== * Russian Spetsnaz Guards Brigade, a playable faction in the game Tom Clancy's EndWar
title: RSGB
